H0.text: star wars episode ii attack of the clones characters. Obi-Wan Kenobi

H1.text: star wars episode ii attack of the clones characters. Anakin Skywalker

H2.text: star wars episode ii attack of the clones characters. Padmé Amidala

H3.text: star wars episode ii attack of the clones characters. Yoda

A4.text: Ewan McGregor as Obi-Wan Kenobi, a Jedi Knight and mentor to his Padawan learner, Anakin Skywalker, who investigates the assassination attempt upon Padmé, leading him to uncover the production of a Clone trooper for the Galactic Republic.

A5.text: Natalie Portman as Padmé Amidala, the former Queen of Naboo, who has recently been elected the planet's Senator, and Anakin's love interest.

A6.text: Obi-Wan traces the assassins to the planet Kamino, where he learns of a massive clone army being created for the Republic.

A7.text: Later, Yoda proclaims Obi-Wan a Jedi Knight and reluctantly allows Anakin to become his Padawan.
